MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G62 and G63 area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Milndavie Road and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have managed to restore supplies to a number of properties and we now expect your supply to be restored via generator by 10.30pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:48pm on Sunday, 07 March 2021.
